item.description:
The task, should you choose to accept it, it to spread the message of Ron Paul to Nashua Republicans and Independents. You will have one day to complete this task. You will be given a list of address and instructions on what to do upon arriving at the meeting place. Your participate could make or break the future of this great nation of ours....

We will meet in the Parking lot in the area near the intersection of Spit brook rd and DW Highway. We'll do a brief sign wave until everyone gets there. Then we'll hand out packets, do a brief tutorial, and then head out.

We need both drivers and canvassers. Typically we like to have two canvassers and one driver per team. It takes about 2-3 hours for a team to complete one packet depending on how close the houses are. When you RSVP, please indicate whether you would like to be a canvasser or driver.

NOTE: THIS CANVASSING EVENT STARTS AT 10AM.
item.name: Canvassing in Nashua
